product_name: The North Face Grizzly Pack Jacket - Men's
long_description: Inspired by the fur of a bear, Polartec(R) Thermal Pro Grizzly high-loft fleece gives The North Face Grizzly Pack jacket an exceptional warmth-to-weight ratio and packability for backcountry adventures. Like animal fur, Grizzly polyester fleece uses a combination of textured and non-textured yarns, and long- and short-pile heights to trap warm air close to the body. FlashDry(TM) panels at collar, back neck, gussets and cuffs stretch to let you move freely and provide moisture management to keep you dry and warm. Thumbholes at cuffs provide extra coverage and warmth. Hem cinch cord with internal pocket adjustment. The North Face Grizzly Pack jacket has two zippered hand pockets and one chest pocket.
short_description: Inspired by the fur of a bear, Polartec(R) Thermal Pro Grizzly high-loft fleece gives The North Face Grizzly Pack jacket an exceptional warmth-to-weight ratio and packability for backcountry adventures.
